short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Extension to control playbackRate of YouTube Video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Control the speed(PlaybackRate) of the YouTube Video through Extension

Range of Control
-  Minimum: 0 ~ Maximum: 5

There are two ways to control
- Range Controller (0.25 per one tick)
- Number Controller (0.5 per one tick)

Or you can adjust specific speed  just by typing number in NumberController
